title: Drawing, Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room, December 10, 1935
title_raw: Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with descriptions, dimensions, instructions
description: Floor plan of terrace game room for Leigh B. Block apartment. Entrance at middle of north wall. To left of entrance is chair and side table; window behind chair at left and flowers along corner of wall. Glass brick wall on west wall and south wall at left. Bar near west wall with five circular bar stools. Two sets of chairs and end tables near bar stool, facing center of room. Three-seat sofa near lower right, facing chairs and end tables. Glass brick wall on lower right south wall and east wall. Circular poker table and chairs in lower right corner; backgammon table and chairs in upper right. Flowers along south wall at right. Radio cabinet to left of backgammon table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room, December 10, 1935. Graphite on tracing paper. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-559
